page.title: 13Birchover News
page.content: "Birchover News" first appeared in July 1977. It was started to provide information and entertainment for everyone in the village, to give individuals the chance to write articles and to help bridge the gap ...between the young and the old, the newcomers and the families who have lived here for generations and the physical separation of those who live at "top end" of the village and those who live down in Eagle Tor. Each edition of "Birchover News" is delivered free of charge to every household in the village.The costs of producing the paper are met almost entirely by donations from villagers who volunteer to "sponsor" an edition This system worked well for the first three years but rising costs are putting a question mark on the future.
